price: All that is in the heavens and earth glorifies[1] Allah, for He is the All-Mighty, the All-Wise.
arabic: سَبَّحَ لِلَّهِ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ
footnotes: [1] By praising and exalting Him far above any deficiency or imperfection.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
